about_the_game:
This is a message log plugin for RPG Maker MZ.

It provides the following functions
・Save and display message logs (can be opened while messages are being displayed)
・Save and load messages in progress
・Organize and save sentences for each event (NPC convo Mode)
・Automatic reorganization of logs (when the number of logs reaches a certain value, the system will automatically reorganize them.)
・Voice recording function
・Auto Read Mode
・Ability to change the color of read sentences
・Function to skip and fast-forward through sentences that have already been read

The sentences displayed by "Show text" are recorded as a log.

Button images are included.
The image for the button can be changed.

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.


〇11/21 Update point
ManoUZ_MessageLog
Fixed @URL.

ManoUZ_Kidoku_AlreadyRead
Fixed a bug that caused an error drop in events where there was no save data and the first choice was the first one.

ManoUZ_MessageLogOption
Modified so that option values can be changed with the decision button.
Modified so that the value can be changed with the button, assuming touch operation.
(Mouse operation is not assumed.)

〇2023/11/16 Update point
Changes to Message log plug-ins
・Fixed a bug that color change was affected during battles.
・Fixed a bug that affected color change during battles. This reduced the number of plugin parameters by one. Removed @param skipSwitch.
・Unbreak obfuscation. Because it has been two years since it was released and the demand has reached a break.

Changes in read-already plugin
・Replaced a part of control with message log plugin.
　Mainly related to skipping, this plugin only handles color changes.
・Fixed a bug that prevented turning off skipping in some situations.
・Fixed a bug that skipping cannot be turned off in some situations.
・Fixed a bug that read skipping is canceled when there is an unread message during read skipping.


The following free plug-ins are included.
All of them are available to the public in other places.

Mano_MessageSkipHighspeed.js
A plugin that skips messages at high speed without read judgment by pressing and holding "Decide" + "Cancel".
This plugin was created because there were requests for a forced skip function, and other plugins had conflicts.

Mano_SaveDisable.js.
A plugin to solve the problem of being able to open the save screen even when save is disabled.
When save is disabled, a special message is displayed and save is disabled.
